mapper.select: SELECT cpp.customer_prepaid_pass_id AS customerPrepaidPassId, 'PREPAID' AS membershipType, pp.prepaid_pass_name AS prepaidPassName, cpp.remaining_amount AS remainingAmount, cpp.expiration_date AS expirationDate, cpp.created_at AS createdAt FROM customer_prepaid_pass cpp JOIN prepaid_pass pp ON cpp.prepaid_pass_id = pp.prepaid_pass_id WHERE (cpp.remaining_amount = 0 OR cpp.expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE) AND cpp.deleted_at IS NULL AND cpp.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT csp.customer_session_pass_id AS customerSessionPassId, 'SESSION' AS membershipType, sp.session_pass_name AS sessionPassName, csp.remaining_count AS remainingCount, csp.expiration_date AS expirationDate, csp.created_at AS createdAt FROM customer_session_pass csp JOIN session_pass sp ON csp.session_pass_id = sp.session_pass_id WHERE (csp.remaining_count = 0 OR csp.expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE) AND csp.deleted_at IS NULL AND csp.customer_id = #{customerId}
